0.name: Flower Pick
0.fullDesc: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Tosses a tile to deal minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

1.name: Cherry on Top!
1.fullDesc:
Deals Quantum DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to {{2, percent}}% of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.
1.shortDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and minor Quantum DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

0.name: A Scoop of Moon
0.fullDesc: Immediately draws {{1}} jade tile(s) and increases DMG by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to {{3}} time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Draws tiles</orangeStrong> and increases DMG dealt. <orangeStrong>This turn does not end</orangeStrong> after this action.

0.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
0.fullDesc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtains 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
0.shortDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to all enemies, then obtains 4 tiles of the same suit.

0.name: Celestial Jade
0.fullDesc:
When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.
If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.
While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by {{1, percent}}%, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".
0.shortDesc: At the start of any ally's turn, draws a tile. At the start of this character's turn, if this character holds 4 tiles from the same suit, remove all tiles in possession and <orangeStrong>Enhance this Basic ATK</orangeStrong> while increasing this character's ATK.

0.name: Game Solitaire
0.fullDesc: After using Technique, Qingque draws {{1}} jade tile(s) when the battle starts.
0.shortDesc: After they use their Technique, draw tile(s) at the start of the next battle.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Tile Battle
0.fullDesc: Restores 1 Skill Point when using the Skill. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per battle.

0.name: Bide Time
0.fullDesc: Using the Skill increases DMG Boost effect of attacks by an extra {{1, percent}}%.

0.name: Winning Hand
0.fullDesc: Qingque's SPD increases by {{1, percent}}% for 1 turn after using the Enhanced Basic ATK.

2.name: Sleep on the Tiles
2.desc: Every time Draw Tile is triggered, Qingque immediately regenerates {{1}} Energy.

3.name: Read Between the Tiles
3.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

4.name: Right on the Tiles
4.desc:
After using Skill, there is a {{1, percent}}% fixed chance to gain Self-Sufficer, lasting until the end of the current turn.
With Self-Sufficer, using Basic ATK or Enhanced Basic ATK immediately launches 1 follow-up attack on the same target, dealing Quantum DMG equal to 100% of Basic ATK DMG or Enhanced Basic ATK DMG.

5.name: Gambit for the Tiles
5.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Prevail Beyond the Tiles
6.desc: Recovers 1 Skill Point after using Enhanced Basic ATK.
